name: Caddy Shack, The
text:
THE CADDY SHACK
IN PARTNERSHIP WITH
SELØR
RESTAURANT & WINE
CALL TO ORDER
PICKUP!
807-475-8825 ext 5
BREAKFAST
served until 2pm
Breakfast Sandwich $6
Fried egg & cheddar cheese with your choice of bacon, sausage or grilled tomato on either white Texas Toast, rye, brioche or grilled croissant.
Add home fries for $4
Caddy Shack Breakfast $13
Two eggs & your choice of bacon, sausage or grilled tomatoes, home fries and choice of toast
Eggs Benedict $16
Two soft poached eggs served on top of grilled croissant with choice of bacon, sausage or grilled tomatoes. Topped with house made hollandaise served with home fries.
Roasted Tomato & Feta Omelette $16
Three fresh eggs whipped with roasted tomatoes, spinach and feta cheese, served with home fries and choice of bread
SALADS
Selør Classic $10/$17
Crisp romaine, peppered bacon, charred lemon Caesar dressing, pangrattato, shaved parmesan
Greek Salad $12/$17
Fresh spring mix tossed with greek and feta dressing, cherry tomatoes, red onion, olives, topped with feta cheese
BLT Steak Salad $23
6oz New York Striploin, peppered bacon, mixed greens, tomatoes, buttermilk ranch blue cheese dressing
Buddah Bowl $20
Fried arborio rice, soft boiled soy egg, pickled ginger, variety of fresh vegetables topped with hoisin glaze and sriracha aioli
SNACKS
Chicken Wings 6pc $16/12pc $28/36pc $60
Available in mild, hot, garlic & sesame, salt & pepper, hot honey, caesar, and burnt onion BBQ
Buffalo 'Bon Bon Ribs' $20
Slow cooked baby back ribs, floured and fried golden, tossed in Frank buffalo sauce bbq. Served with your choice of wing sauce
Crispy Dusted Shrimp $15
Lightly dusted and fried jumbo shrimp, served with sweet chili aioli
Grilled Mushroom Flatbread $17
Cremini mushrooms, smoked cheddar cheese, roasted red peppers, & goat cheese, topped with balsamic glaze
HAND HELD
comes with choice of fries or side house salad
upgrade to caesar salad, greek salad or poutine for $3
Chopped Chicken Caesar Wrap $19
Buttermilk fried chicken chopped with peppered bacon, cucumber, Caesar dressing and Parmesan cheese
Buffalo Chicken Wrap $19
Buttermilk fried chicken tossed in our house made buffalo sauce, lettuce, tomato and ranch withen
Caddy Shack Burger $17
Two 3oz fresh ground beef patties topped with caramelized bacon jam, roasted tomatoes, spring mix, shack sauce & smoked cheddar cheese. Served on a grilled brioche bun.
Classic Canadian Burger $17
Two 3oz fresh ground beef patties, cheddar cheese, ketchup, mustard, mayo, house made pickles, served on a grilled brioche bun
...add bacon $2 ...add fried egg $2 ...add bacon jam $2
Montreal Smoked Meat Sandwich $18
Lightly sauteed smoked meat on a grilled sourdough bread with Dijon aioli and fried cabbage
Pulled Pork Grilled Cheese $20
Slow roasted pork tossed in our house made burnt onion BBQ sauce, bacon onion jam, smoked cheddar cheesem a grilled sourdough bread
Caddy Shack Club $20
Grilled chicken breast, tossed in our burnt onion BBQ sauce with smoked cheddar cheese, roasted tomatoes & lettuce. Served on choice of bread
CLASSICS
NY Steak Sandwich $23
Served on grilled focaccia, garlic aioli, sauteed mushrooms in red wine beef paste. Served with choice of side
Shrimp Po Boy $20
Jumbo tiger shrimp, lightly fried, served on grilled focaccia with house made pickles, roasted tomatoes and sweet chili aioli served with choice of side
Orecchiette Pasta $22
Grilled chicken, peppered bacon, roasted red peppers, in a maple cream sauce served with toasted focaccia
Baby Back Ribs Half $20/Full $28
Slow smoked back ribs with our house made burnt onion BBQ sauce, served with choice of side
